thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com
thread.title: Estelle

author: Estelle
title: Estelle
text:
I have never had to return anything so have no issues with this!
Always have been happy with my purchases great merchandise!
Great free shipping and prompt service sending off the goods!
The sizes sell out quick, especially mine, being petite and obviously popular sizes and brands, hopefully, they will stock up! Did want to buy a pair of jeans and it was sold out, having to choose another colour, so just stock up and keep the customers happy!
Looking forward to future shopping with this company!
